title: Future possilbe snow down skins
body:
Ok so with the snow down apon us i have had some thoughts on possible skin idea for the next snow down
Trundle the Grinch
Candy Cane Nasus
Tinsel Talon
Christmas tree Zyra
just  some idea's for the next snow down of 2015

replies.body:
Present Day Gnar.

Polo Express Sion.

Queen of Snowfield Syndra.

Santa Shen, Shenta.

Jax Frost (Jack Frost from the 1998 snowman dad film). Ezreal already has the other Jack.

Jesus Karthus (Jethus) ????????

> Jesus Karthus (Jethus) ????????

Would it take three days for him to respawn?
